MAN.TITLE: translatepaths
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: translate a set of Matlab M_file directories to scilab

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : a character string vector which gives the paths of Matlab M_file directories to translate
: a character string which gives the path of the directory where the scilab functions are written to.

DESCRIPTION.P: translatepaths, translate all Matlab M-file contained in a set of directories to Scilab functions. Each function is translated by mfile2sci.
Trace of translation informations are stored in a file named "log" in the res_path directory

MAN.AUTHOR: Serge Steer, INRIA
